movie.title: Judy
movie.plot: Legendary performer Judy Garland arrives in London in the winter of 1968 to perform a series of sold-out concerts.

events.title: Live at the Austin Outhouse is recorded on two consecutive nights, weeks before Blaze's death

movie.title: Blaze
movie.plot: A reimagining of the life and times of Blaze Foley, the unsung songwriting legend of the Texas Outlaw Music movement.
